displayName: Ensure that 'Security contact emails' is set
rationale: Microsoft reaches out to the designated security contact in case its security team finds that the organization's resources are compromised. This ensures that the proper people are aware of any potential compromise in order to mitigate the risk in a timely fashion.
recommended_action:
1. Go to Security Center
2. Click on Security Policy
3. Click On Edit Settings for the security policy subscription
4. Click on Email notifications
5.  Set Send email also to subscription owners to On
6. Click Save
error_message: Security center contact information is not set
ruleNames: Ensure that security contact emails are set
